text: Pedro Carvalho (born July 15, 1985) is a Portuguese actor. ==Biography== Pedro Carvalho was born in Guarda, Portugal, but grew up in Fundão, where he lived until 17 when he moved to Lisbon to pursue a career as an actor. He finished the professional course of ACT - School of Actors for Cinema and Television in 2007 and since then he has worked in television, cinema and theater. ==Filmography== ===Television=== {| class="wikitable" !
